description: This Python script demonstrates how to use Pipedream MCP servers with Agno Agents, specifically for Slack integration. It sets up an asynchronous agent that connects to the MCP server and performs actions like reading messages and sending messages in Slack channels.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a language model and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used by the agent.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: Provides tools to interact with MCP servers.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronously runs the agent to perform a specified task, such as reading or sending Slack messages.
